analyzed: spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'i dbu dang ldan zhing legs par grub pas dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The head is large, with a cranial dome, and the head-hairs grow in the right direction, with the right twist.

original: au dpal dmar po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas ljags yangs shing srab pa'o //
analyzed: au dpal dmar po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas ljags yangs shing srab pa'o //
translated: The tongue is slender and long, like the petal of a red lotus.

original: bya ka la pi dha'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so //
analyzed: bya ka la pi dha'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so //
translated: The voice is like the voice of BrahmƒÅ, like the voice of the kalavi·πÖka bird.

original: 'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o //
translated: The cheeks are like the surface of a mirror, well-formed, beautiful, and attractive, like the cheeks of a lion.

original: me tog ku nda dang zla ba ltar shin tu dka' ba'i tshoms mnga' bas tshems shin tu dkar ba'o //üîΩtshoms mtho dman med pas tshoms mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: me tog ku nda dang zla ba ltar shin tu dka' ba'i tshoms mnga' bas tshems shin tu dkar ba'o // tshoms mtho dman med pas tshoms mnyam pa'o //
translated: His teeth are very white, like jasmine and the moon.üîΩHis teeth are even, without gaps.

original: tshoms la bar mtshams med pas tshoms thags bzang ba'o //üîΩbla 'og gye gu med pas tshoms mnyam zhing bzhi bcu @248a * //
analyzed: tshoms la bar mtshams med pas tshoms thags bzang ba'o // bla 'og gye gu med pas tshoms mnyam zhing bzhi bcu @248a * //
translated: His teeth are well-aligned, without spaces.üîΩHis teeth are forty in number, with no extra ones.

original: tshang ba'o // dkar nag cha ma 'dres la ma nyams shing mdog dmar pos ma g-yogs pas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'o //
analyzed: tshang ba'o // dkar nag cha ma 'dres la ma nyams shing mdog dmar pos ma g-yogs pas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'o //
translated: His eyes are deep blue, with no white showing.

original: rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzings pas ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o zhes bya ba dag ste /
analyzed: rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzings pas ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o zhes bya ba dag ste /
translated: His eyelashes are like those of a magnificent heifer.

original: mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis rtag tu ldan pa gang yin pa de dag ni ston pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis rtag tu ldan pa gang yin pa de dag ni ston pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Those who always have these thirty-two excellent marks are said to have the marks of a teacher.

original: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad la sems chags pa dang bral bas sen mo zangs kyi mdog tu 'dug pa yin /
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad la sems chags pa dang bral bas sen mo zangs kyi mdog tu 'dug pa yin /
translated: Because his mind is free from attachment to all compositional activity, his nails are the color of copper.

original: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' bas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba ste sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' bas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba ste sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin /
translated: Because he has the intention to benefit and bring happiness to all sentient beings, his nails are shiny.

original: rigs dang rgyud mtho ba dang ldan pas sen mo mtho ba yin /
analyzed: rigs dang rgyud mtho ba dang ldan pas sen mo mtho ba yin /
translated: Because he has a high family lineage, his nails are high.

original: kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' bas sor mo zlum pa yin /üîΩdge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pas sor mo rgyas pa yin /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' bas sor mo zlum pa yin / dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pas sor mo rgyas pa yin /
translated: Because he is without wrongdoing, his fingers are rounded.üîΩBecause he has accumulated the roots of virtue, his fingers are full.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis bsags pas sor mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis bsags pas sor mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin /
translated: Because he has gradually accumulated the roots of virtue, his fingers are tapered.

original: sku la sogs pa'i phra ni las dang 'tsho ba shin tu dben pas rtsa mi mngon pa yin /
analyzed: sku la sogs pa'i phra ni las dang 'tsho ba shin tu dben pas rtsa mi mngon pa yin /
translated: Because his body and so forth are free from the subtle faults of action and livelihood, his veins are not visible.

original: nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa grol bas na rtsa mdud pa med pa yin /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa grol bas na rtsa mdud pa med pa yin /
translated: Because he has untied the knots of the afflictions, his veins are not knotted.

original: shin tu gsal ba'i chos mnga' bas na long bu mi mngon pa yin /
analyzed: shin tu gsal ba'i chos mnga' bas na long bu mi mngon pa yin /
translated: His ankles do not protrude because he has the quality of being very clear.

original: mi mnyam pa thams cad las sgrol bas na zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa thams cad las sgrol bas na zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin /
translated: He has no uneven feet because he liberates all from unevenness.

original: mi'i seng ge yin pas na seng ge'i stabs su bzhud pa yin /
analyzed: mi'i seng ge yin pas na seng ge'i stabs su bzhud pa yin /
translated: He has the gait of a lion because he is the lion of men.

original: glang po dgu'i stobs dang ldan pas na glang po'i stabs su bzhud pa yin /
analyzed: glang po dgu'i stobs dang ldan pas na glang po'i stabs su bzhud pa yin /
translated: He has the gait of an elephant because he has the strength of nine elephants.

original: ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la gshegs pas ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin /
analyzed: ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la gshegs pas ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin /
translated: He has the gait of a swan because he moves through the sky like the king of swans.

original: mi'i khyu mchog yin pas khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin /
analyzed: mi'i khyu mchog yin pas khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin /
translated: He has the gait of a bull because he is the bull of men.

original: rjes su mthun pa'i lam mnga' bas g-yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin /
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa'i lam mnga' bas g-yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin /
translated: He moves clockwise because he has the path of concordance.

original: blta na mdzes pas na mdzes par bzhud pa yin /
analyzed: blta na mdzes pas na mdzes par bzhud pa yin /
translated: He has a beautiful gait because he is beautiful to behold.

original: rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' bas mi yo bar bzhud pa yin /
analyzed: rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' bas mi yo bar bzhud pa yin /
translated: He has a steady gait because he never has an unsteady mind.

original: tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pas sku legs pa yin /
analyzed: tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pas sku legs pa yin /
translated: His body is well proportioned because he teaches the qualities of pure conduct.

original: sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pas na sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin /
analyzed: sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pas na sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin /
translated: His body is very supple because he has completely purified all negative qualities.

original: chos rim gyis ston pas na sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin /
analyzed: chos rim gyis ston pas na sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin /
translated: His body is gradually tapered because he teaches the Dharma gradually.

original: sku la sogs pa gtsang ba dang ldan pas sku shin tu gtsang ba yin /
analyzed: sku la sogs pa gtsang ba dang ldan pas sku shin tu gtsang ba yin /
translated: His body is very clean because it is endowed with cleanliness and so forth.

original: rang bzhin gyis thugs @248b 'jam pa dang ldan pas sku shin tu 'jam pa yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis thugs @248b 'jam pa dang ldan pas sku shin tu 'jam pa yin /
translated: His body is very smooth because it is endowed with a naturally smooth mind.

original: rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pas sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pas sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin /
translated: His body is very pure because it is endowed with a naturally smooth mind.

original: chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pas na sku shin tu rdzogs pa yin /
analyzed: chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pas na sku shin tu rdzogs pa yin /
translated: His body is very complete because he has completely perfected the Dharma and the Vinaya.

original: yon tan rdzogs shing bzang ba ston pas na sku che zhing mdzes pa yin /
analyzed: yon tan rdzogs shing bzang ba ston pas na sku che zhing mdzes pa yin /
translated: His body is large and beautiful because he teaches the perfection and excellence of good qualities.

original: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' bas sku legs par mnga' ba yin /üîΩshin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston pas spyan shin tu rnam par dag pa yin /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' bas sku legs par mnga' ba yin / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston pas spyan shin tu rnam par dag pa yin /
translated: His body is well proportioned because he has a mind that is impartial toward all sentient beings.üîΩHis eyes are very pure because he teaches the Dharma in a very pure way.

original: shin tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pas na sku shin tu gzhon pa yin /
analyzed: shin tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pas na sku shin tu gzhon pa yin /
translated: His body is very youthful because he teaches the Dharma in a very smooth way.

original: thugs rtag tu zhum pa mi mnga' bas na sku zhum pa med pa yin /
analyzed: thugs rtag tu zhum pa mi mnga' bas na sku zhum pa med pa yin /
translated: His body is without stoop because his mind is never depressed.

original: sems can thams cad la mnyan pa'i thugs mnga' bas dge ba'i rtsa ba rdzogs pas na sku shin tu rgyas pa yin /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la mnyan pa'i thugs mnga' bas dge ba'i rtsa ba rdzogs pas na sku shin tu rgyas pa yin /
translated: His body is very full because he has completed the roots of virtue and has a mind that is impartial to all sentient beings.

original: srid pa bcom zhing zad pas sku shin tu mkhregs pa yin /
analyzed: srid pa bcom zhing zad pas sku shin tu mkhregs pa yin /
translated: His body is very firm because he has conquered and exhausted cyclic existence.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag legs par ston pas na yan lag dang nying lag so sor mdzes pa yin /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag legs par ston pas na yan lag dang nying lag so sor mdzes pa yin /
translated: His major and minor body parts are beautiful because he has well shown the major and minor limbs of dependent arising.

original: shin tu rnam par dag par gzigs pas na snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag par gzigs pas na snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin /
translated: His appearance is without cataracts and is pure because he sees things as very pure.

original: gzhi tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' bas na dku skabs zlum pa yin /
analyzed: gzhi tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' bas na dku skabs zlum pa yin /
translated: His belly is round because he has disciples who are suitable vessels.

original: 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad sbyangs pas na dku skabs byang ba yin /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad sbyangs pas na dku skabs byang ba yin /
translated: His belly is smooth because he has purified all the faults of cyclic existence.

original: nga rgyal gyi ri bo bcom pas na dku skabs ma zhom pa yin /
analyzed: nga rgyal gyi ri bo bcom pas na dku skabs ma zhom pa yin /
translated: His belly is not sunken because he has conquered the mountain of pride.

original: chos zad par rnam par bzlog pas phyal phyad de ba yin /
analyzed: chos zad par rnam par bzlog pas phyal phyad de ba yin /
translated: His belly is not protruding because he has turned away from the exhaustion of phenomena.

original: chos zab mo thugs su chud pas lte ba zab pa yin /
analyzed: chos zab mo thugs su chud pas lte ba zab pa yin /
translated: His navel is deep because he has realized the profound Dharma.

original: mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' bas lte ba g-yas su 'khyil ba yin /
analyzed: mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' bas lte ba g-yas su 'khyil ba yin /
translated: His navel is coiled to the right because he has disciples who hold him in harmony.

original: slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' bas kun nas mdzes pa yin /
analyzed: slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' bas kun nas mdzes pa yin /
translated: He is completely beautiful because he has a sa·πÖgha of disciples who are completely beautiful.

original: thugs shin tu gtsang ba'i mchog dang ldan pas kun nas spyod pa gtsang ba yin /
analyzed: thugs shin tu gtsang ba'i mchog dang ldan pas kun nas spyod pa gtsang ba yin /
translated: He has completely pure conduct because he has a completely pure mind.

original: chos nag po ston pa dang bral ba'i chos 'dul ba mnga' bas skul la sme ba med pa yin /
analyzed: chos nag po ston pa dang bral ba'i chos 'dul ba mnga' bas skul la sme ba med pa yin /
translated: He has no moles on his body because he has a Dharma and Vinaya that is free from the teaching of the dark side.

original: shing bal ltar rab tu yang ba thob pa'i chos ston pas phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa yin /
analyzed: shing bal ltar rab tu yang ba thob pa'i chos ston pas phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa yin /
translated: His hands are soft like cotton because he teaches a Dharma that is as light as cotton.

original: skye bo la byams shing dge sbyong chen po mnyes pas phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin /
analyzed: skye bo la byams shing dge sbyong chen po mnyes pas phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin /
translated: His hand lines are oily because he is loved by people and pleases the great practitioners.

original: mchog tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pas phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin //
analyzed: mchog tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pas phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin //
translated: His hand lines are deep because he is supremely profound and stable.

original: bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pas phyag gi sor mo ring ba yin /
analyzed: bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pas phyag gi sor mo ring ba yin /
translated: His fingers are long because he teaches the Dharma of vast patience.

original: bslab pa'i gnas mi ring bar @249a * //
analyzed: bslab pa'i gnas mi ring bar @249a * //
translated: He has not transgressed the precepts of training because his fingers are not tapered.

original: 'cha' bas zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba yin /
analyzed: 'cha' bas zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba yin /
translated: His face is not too long because he has abandoned pride.

original: gzugs brnyan 'jig rten du bskye  bas zhal gyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan 'jig rten du bskye  bas zhal gyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin /
translated: His face is radiant because he has taken birth in the world.

original: 'jam pa sngon du btang zhing dul bas ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin /
analyzed: 'jam pa sngon du btang zhing dul bas ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin /
translated: His tongue is very supple because he has previously been gentle and disciplined.

original: yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pas ljags shin tu srab pa yin /
analyzed: yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pas ljags shin tu srab pa yin /
translated: His tongue is very slender because he possesses a multitude of subtle good qualities.

original: byis pa'i skye bo'i 'dod chags kyis chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag dka' bas na ljags dmar ba yin /
analyzed: byis pa'i skye bo'i 'dod chags kyis chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag dka' bas na ljags dmar ba yin /
translated: His tongue is red because it is difficult for childish beings to fathom the Dharma and the Vinaya due to their attachment.

original: glang po'i sgra dang 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyems pa mi mnga' bas glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: glang po'i sgra dang 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyems pa mi mnga' bas glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin /
translated: He has the voice of an elephant and the voice of a dragon because he is not arrogant.

original: snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' bas snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' bas snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin /
translated: He has a voice that is pleasant, gentle, and delightful because he has disciples who speak pleasantly, gently, and delightfully.

original: srid pa kun du sbyor ba las 'das pas tshoms mche ba zlum pa yin /
analyzed: srid pa kun du sbyor ba las 'das pas tshoms mche ba zlum pa yin /
translated: His cheekbones are rounded because he has transcended the fetters of existence.

original: skye bo rno ba rnams shin tu 'dul ba dang ldan pas tshoms mche ba rno ba yin /
analyzed: skye bo rno ba rnams shin tu 'dul ba dang ldan pas tshoms mche ba rno ba yin /
translated: His jaws are strong because he has subdued the very strong.

original: shin tu dkar ba'i chos kyis 'dul bas tshoms mche ba dkar ba yin /
analyzed: shin tu dkar ba'i chos kyis 'dul bas tshoms mche ba dkar ba yin /
translated: His jaws are white because he has subdued with the very white Dharma.

original: sa phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pas mche ba mnyam pa yin /
analyzed: sa phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pas mche ba mnyam pa yin /
translated: His jaws are even because he sits on even ground.

original: mngon par rtogs pa'i chos rim gyis ston pas tshoms  mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa'i chos rim gyis ston pas tshoms  mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin /
translated: His jaws are gradually sloping because he teaches the Dharma of realization gradually.

original: shes rab mthon po'i ri bo la bzhugs pas shangs mtho ba yin /
analyzed: shes rab mthon po'i ri bo la bzhugs pas shangs mtho ba yin /
translated: His nose is prominent because he sits on the mountain of high wisdom.

original: gtsang ba'i 'dul ba mnga' bas shangs gtsang ba yin /
analyzed: gtsang ba'i 'dul ba mnga' bas shangs gtsang ba yin /
translated: His nose is clean because he has a clean discipline.

original: sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul yangs pa mnga' bas spyan yangs pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul yangs pa mnga' bas spyan yangs pa yin /
translated: His eyes are wide because he has the vast miracles of a Buddha.

original: gzigs pa rnam par dag pas spyan rnam par dag pa yin //
analyzed: gzigs pa rnam par dag pas spyan rnam par dag pa yin //
translated: His eyes are pure because his vision is pure.

original: sems can gyi tshogs bsags pas rdzi ma stag pa yin //
analyzed: sems can gyi tshogs bsags pas rdzi ma stag pa yin //
translated: His eyebrows are thick because he has accumulated a multitude of sentient beings.

original: lha dang lha ma yin dang // skyes bu dang na chung gi mig dkar nag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ltar 'dug pas mngon par dga' bar byas pas na spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu yin /
analyzed: lha dang lha ma yin dang // skyes bu dang na chung gi mig dkar nag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ltar 'dug pas mngon par dga' bar byas pas na spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu yin /
translated: His eyes are long and beautiful because he delights the gods, demigods, men, and women with his eyes, which are like lotus petals, with their white and black parts distinct.

original: rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pas smin ma ring ba yin /
analyzed: rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pas smin ma ring ba yin /
translated: His eyebrows are long because he always sees what is vast.

original: 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pas smin ma gnyis 'jam pa yin /
analyzed: 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pas smin ma gnyis 'jam pa yin /
translated: His eyebrows are smooth because he is skilled in gentle discipline.

original: skyon thams cad mkhyen pas smin ma'i spu mnyam pa yin /
analyzed: skyon thams cad mkhyen pas smin ma'i spu mnyam pa yin /
translated: His eyebrows are even because he knows all faults.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems can snum pa'i skye bo 'dul bas smin ma gnyis snum pa yin /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems can snum pa'i skye bo 'dul bas smin ma gnyis snum pa yin /
translated: His eyebrows are oily because he disciplines beings who are oily with the oil of the roots of virtue.

original: chos mchog tu yangs shing don mang po dang ldan pas snyan shal ring ba yin /
analyzed: chos mchog tu yangs shing don mang po dang ldan pas snyan shal ring ba yin /
translated: His neck is long because the Dharma is very vast and has many meanings.

original: nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rgyal pas snyan mnyam @249b pa yin /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rgyal pas snyan mnyam @249b pa yin /
translated: His ears are even because he is victorious over the continuum of afflictions.

original: sems can bsam pa ma nyams par 'dul bas snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa yin /
analyzed: sems can bsam pa ma nyams par 'dul bas snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa yin /
translated: His ears are undamaged because he disciplines beings with undamaged intentions.

original: lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad byang bas dpral ba legs pa yin /
analyzed: lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad byang bas dpral ba legs pa yin /
translated: His forehead is excellent because he has purified all aspects of view.

original: bram ze dang dge sbyong la sogs pa phas kyi rgol ba 'dul bas dpral ba yangs pa yin /
analyzed: bram ze dang dge sbyong la sogs pa phas kyi rgol ba 'dul bas dpral ba yangs pa yin /
translated: His forehead is broad because he has subdued all opponents, such as brahmins and ascetics.

original: smon lam yongs su rdzogs pas na dbu rgyas pa yin /
analyzed: smon lam yongs su rdzogs pas na dbu rgyas pa yin /
translated: His head is large because his aspirations are fulfilled.

original: yul la 'khor ba'i bung ba bzlog pas dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa yin /
analyzed: yul la 'khor ba'i bung ba bzlog pas dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa yin /
translated: His hair is black like a bee because he has turned away from the objects of cyclic existence.

original: mthong ba dang bsgoms pas spong ba'i nyon mongs pa zad pas dbu sgra 'khyil ba yin /
analyzed: mthong ba dang bsgoms pas spong ba'i nyon mongs pa zad pas dbu sgra 'khyil ba yin /
translated: His hair curls to the right because he has exhausted the afflictions that are abandoned through the paths of seeing and meditation.

original: thugs mnyam par bstan pa'i snying po mkhyen pa dang skra 'jam pa yin /
analyzed: thugs mnyam par bstan pa'i snying po mkhyen pa dang skra 'jam pa yin /
translated: His hair is soft because he has the knowledge of the essence of the teachings that he has revealed.

original: rtag tu thugs ma 'khrul bas dbu skra ma 'dzings pa yin /
